description:
Mink and Tank take a break from the thief business to go on vacation, but end up quarreling over Tank`s repeated blunders. When the depressed Tank runs off and gets possessed by a Dance Stone, can the power of Mink`s love snap him out of it?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dancing Love?! Mink and Tank`s Day Off!
Odoru Koigokoro!? Mink Tank no Kyuujitsu
踊る恋心!? ミンク・タンクの休日
